name: JERK HOUSE CARIBBEAN RESTAURANT
address: 4246 White Plains Rd, Bronx, NY 10466, USA

reviews.text: Genuinely positive atmosphere and meals with the home cook feel ü§ûüèæ‚ú®

One of the best restaurants in the entire tri state!! (Coming from a foodie lol) the ladies are always in good vibes & couldn‚Äôt ask for better service!
The restaurant staff have  amazing customer service and hospitality
Food is amazing!!!! I haven‚Äôt been able to eat anything else since I had the food. It‚Äôs been 2 weeks.
The best delicious food. Very delicious to the bones. The chef did an awesome job. I will be coming back. Too sweet to not come back
Excellent customer service, friendly staff
Nuff vibes and good food

One of my favorite places to get lunch when I‚Äôm in this area

The food was absolutely delicious, full of flavor and perfectly seasoned! The service was just as great, friendly, attentive, and welcoming from start to finish. Definitely one of the best Caribbean spots around, can‚Äôt wait to come back! üôåüî•üçóüáØüá≤
Best jerk chicken ever love coming here
TRACEY WAS AMAZING .. and treated me well on my BIRTHDAY ! Thank you Tracey !

Was recommended by my coworker to come here and try the jerk chicken, and I must say. This was some of the best jerk chicken, peas and rice, and vegs. I have ever had! The staff was friendly , and the food was fresh. I will definitely be coming back here in my future days to come!
Fast and good food

If you‚Äôre looking for authentic Caribbean flavor in the Bronx, The Jerk House stands out as one of those spots that knows exactly what it‚Äôs doing. The moment you walk in, you‚Äôre met with that unmistakable aroma of slow-marinated jerk seasoning, smoke, and spice that tells you the food is being taken seriously.
The food was so delicious! I has to visit a second time. Shout out to the workers. Especially the one who remembered us.
The food was everything. Definitely a place you should visit if you miss home
Jerk Chicken , rice & peas and cabbage are delicious !!
Great food. People welcoming

Amazing service
Best food
Food is delicious. Must try if you‚Äôre in the area!
Very nice and good is amazing
Best Rasta pasta!
Awesome service.  Greeted with pleasant smile and big hello.
They were really nice and respectful
Good and great service Sancia
Was quick and food is good
Great service sancia
Food is always fresh and delicious

I recently ordered a medium meal and was disappointed with the overall experience. The fried chicken was extremely dry, and I was unexpectedly charged an additional $2‚Äì$3 for just three small plantains. While the mac and cheese was the only item that stood out in terms of quality, the rest of the meal did not meet expectations‚Äîespecially for the $19 total cost.
Additionally, it would be helpful if staff clearly communicated any extra charges before adding items to the plate. Transparency around pricing would go a long way in improving the customer experience.

I don't advise eating more than two pounds of jerk pork in any one sitting. Hard to do at this place since the pork is excellent.
Highly recommend.
The food was delicious and the services was wonderful.
Best food in the bronx!!

I tried Jerk House Caribbean Restaurant and it did not disappoint! I ordered the Jerk Chicken and Fried Chicken and both were full of flavor. The jerk chicken had that perfect balance of spice and smoky seasoning, tender and juicy with just the right kick. The fried chicken was crispy on the outside and well-seasoned inside, not greasy at all.
The portions were generous and everything tasted fresh and homemade. You can tell they put real love into their cooking. Definitely one of the best Caribbean spots around. I‚Äôll be coming back for sure!
Food is always on point. Good portions of everything, love the staff their aways in a good mood. Very efficient
Good food
Food is very good, especially the stew peas. Real yaaad man ting. üî•üî•üî•
Lexcine has such great customer service!!!! All the ladies are great
Great customer service always recommended to others.
Came out my car and could smell the food from outside! Came in the restaurant food was amazing and so was the service!
Workers are friendly and welcoming!
Everyone was so nice and amazing and the food was good too
Service superb, food delicious, vibe RIGHT
This restaurant has very delicious food. I enjoy eating there everyday Saturday and encourage everyone to come and try one of the four locations

It depends if the staff preparing your order(s) are not busy laughing and joking between themselves. This establishment is NOT professionally sound due to the kind of people running this particular business.

I had such a wonderful experience at this spot! From the moment I walked in, the service was warm and welcoming. Tameka went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect‚Äîher kindness and attention really stood out. The food was absolutely delicious, especially the jerk chicken, which was bursting with flavor, and the oxtail curry, which was rich and perfectly seasoned. Everything tasted fresh, authentic, and cooked with love. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back and highly recommend this place to anyone looking for amazing food and exceptional service!

This review is strictly about the jerk chicken! I‚Äôve ordered it about 4 times because the first time I had it I really loved it, the other 3 times including today it‚Äôs absolute trash. The entire thing is mushy and saggy. It looks like soup meat literally. Very disappointed! Maybe I‚Äôm taking the name of the restaurant too literal ‚ÄúJERK HOUSE‚Äù

Ppl are friendly and food is delicious especially grill pork oh man! Best part is they have small portions this cost 26$ just to give you an idea.‚ò∫Ô∏èI‚Äôm very happy and will come bck and refer ppl.

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Absolutely Amazing Experience at Jerk House!
From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warm smiles and friendly service ‚Äî the staff were genuinely pleasant and made me feel right at home. But the real star of the show was the food! Every bite was tantalizing ‚Äî packed with bold, authentic flavors that left me wanting more. The sweet chilli chicken was perfectly seasoned, juicy, and absolutely delicious. You can tell everything is made with care and passion. If you‚Äôre craving Caribbean flavor done right, Jerk House is the place to go. Highly recommend! Check out my full review on TikTok @foodiegirlnyc

I ordered a delivery from this place  on uber eats because I saw that devour power recommended it on Facebook and let me tell you the food was a very tasty experience. Dinner for my mom and I was the Mac and cheese, jerk chicken and the jerk ribs meal. We will definitely order again. It did not disappoint.

I love the fried whiting, it's consistent,  not oliy or too much breading. It also is not salty like some places. The staff is welcoming and the food is always displayed nice and neat. The preparation area is clean as well.

I really enjoyed my meal at the Jerk House. From the moment I walked in, Shantia greeted me with a warm smile and kindly took my order. When I asked for a recommendation, she was pleasant and helpful. Thank you for your great service, Shantia! The restaurant was very clean, and the food was beautifully displayed.

I should‚Äôve written this long ago, but life, ya know?
Speaking about life‚Ä¶ if you ever want to make life worth while and enjoy the finer things in life‚Ä¶ do yourself a favor: go stop in Jerk House. They might as well call themselves Burger King, because it‚Äôs always your way. They are an amazing service. Amazing food. Shout out to Tracie!!!

The food here is ridiculously delicious. There‚Äôs so much flavor to everything they make. The portions are very generous and the prices are reasonable. The service is very quick and polite. My only complaint is that the food is so delicious that I had a bit of trouble stopping eating. There are worse troubles though. I highly recommend this place. Superb.
Friendly staff, food was SO DELICIOUS!!! place is clean and they are generous with the portions
Yallllll, when I say I tried almost everything in Jerk House‚Ä¶ this foooood is sooo favorably delicious!! Don‚Äôt walk, RUNNNN!!!! That snapper, oxtail, Rasta pasta, sooooo good

I must say that this spot is nice. My son loves the bake chicken here, I love their fry chicken. The restaurant is small, the decor is cute and the staff is nice. I've ordered for takeout and delivery and never had any issues. Go check them out of you're on White Plains Road, corner of 235 St.

Food was absolutely unpleasant. If you‚Äôre Jamaican or meant to try authentic Jamaican food, this is definitely not the place to go. No effort was put into the meals. Curry goat was dry. Rice and peas tasted terribly. Wings and Mac &cheese were the worse I‚Äôve ever had (wings were soggy) The only redeemable food here was the oxtail which I‚Äôd give a 6/10 and that me being nice. Again as a Jamaican who knows how authentic Jamaican food tastes, this is NOT the place you want to waste $20 in a meal for. Hope this helps.ü´∂üèΩ
Best food on the block non stop everyone I‚Äôm in town I gotta stop here and nowhere else

The food was excellent, and the service made the experience even better. Tamika and Tracy always provide outstanding hospitality‚ÄîI've been here a few times, and they greet me with a warm smile every time. They're both incredibly kind and welcoming. Highly recommend‚Äî10/10!

This is our spot for the best jerk in the Bronx.  Other places may taste better on certain days, but this place is always consistently good, pork is always juicy, occasional dry piece but the meat overall is good.  You can get a meal with just steamed veg if you like, and the steamed veg is real good here.  Slightly on the saltier side, but tasty and goes well with the meal.  Before the pandemic they used to have hand-made beef patties. Have not seen those in a while but highly recommend those when they come back.
Staff always pleasant.  Always.  Overall for me, a consistent spot I can rely on.

I purchased a full pan of curry goat to go along with other  items that were already home cooked or purchased elsewhere for a birthday dinner thrown in my honor for Saturday 4/19/25 and I take my hat off to whomever cooked it. Thank you so much‚ù§Ô∏èüî•üî•üî•üî•

The staff is very pleasant. The food is great. Definitely recommend them for the Jerk Pork and Jerk Chicken if you like Jerk items. It is moist and well seasoned. Today I‚Äôm having curry chicken. Looks great, can‚Äôt wait to dig in.
First time at the Jerk House. Monique and  Tracy were very courteous and professional. Attentive to our needs. The Food was AWESOME!!! Highly recommended you come visit and eat.

OH MY LORD, THIS PLACE IS SENT FROM JESUS IN THE FLESSHHHH. The hospitality, let alone the decor. The FOODDDDDDDD is so good, and the plate size are for people that wants to eat. ITS SO GOODDDD ALL AROUND 1000/10

When I arrived at Jerk House, I was initially unsure of what to order. After deciding, I began placing my order with the waitress. After I shared my choice, she and another staff member walked over to the food area and started laughing together, as if something I said was funny. I found this behavior to be unprofessional and disrespectful. Additionally, the portion size of the food was quite small for the price I paid. I politely requested a larger portion, but my request was met with rudeness and completely ignored. Based on my experience, I would definitely recommend going to a different location.

On 1/16 I Ordered via DoorDash for delivery, but I called to ask a question. I must say, the woman who answered the phone around 6pm, and called me back was very pleasant and courteous. I ordered a medium Jerk chicken meal, which comes with rice & peas and cabbage; I also ordered an additional side of Mac and cheese. My total was $16.00 and I enjoyed every bit of it. I appreciate that the chicken held that jerk flavor, but was not overly spice or dry. If you like cheesy/creamy mac and cheese you may not care for their mac; I don't think it's like "omg I have to have it ", but it pairs well with the meal and I was full. I'll definitely order this meal again.

I was able to place and receive my order quickly. Great customer service. Good place to sit and eat. Sits about 6 people inside. I ordered the jerk chicken Rasta pasta. It‚Äôs the best Rasta pasta in this area.
The service is wonderful the food is great! Both ladies that served me today were absolutely wonderful and  very polite. Would definitely come back here and highly recommended to others as well.

Jerk House is hands down one of the best restaurants I‚Äôve ever been to! From the moment I walked in, the staff made me feel right at home ‚Äì they‚Äôre always friendly, welcoming, and treat you like family. The food? Absolutely incredible. Every dish is packed with flavor, from the perfectly seasoned jerk chicken to the delicious sides. You can tell everything is made with love and authenticity.

Since the first time I tried Jerk House, I‚Äôve been coming back almost every day ‚Äì that‚Äôs how good it is. It‚Äôs honestly addictive in the best way possible. If you‚Äôre looking for amazing Jamaican food and great vibes, this is the place to be!
The food was bomb üí£ so much flavor and care put into the food. It makes me want to live out here in the Bronx ü´∂ Definitely coming here again and recommending my family here.

If I could give the food ten stars, I would. The fried chicken was absolutely amazing. The oxtail was extremely tender and fell right off the bone. I got there at about eleven thirty in the morning and the food was all nice and fresh. I highly heiley I recommend this place. I randomly chose this place off of a google search and I was not disappointed at all

recently dined at Jerkhouse and was thoroughly impressed by both the exquisite cuisine and the impeccable service. The menu showcased a variety of innovative dishes, blending bold flavors and beautiful presentation. The attentive and knowledgeable staff ensured that our meal was a memorable one, providing excellent recommendations and ensuring our satisfaction. I can‚Äôt recommend Jerkhouse enough for a fantastic dining experience

Sancia was wonderful! I‚Äôve been here before and didn‚Äôt have the best experience with the staff, but today was a completely different story. She was so warm and welcoming‚ÄîI truly appreciated it!‚Äù

I went to visit my mother in White Plains and wanted something to eat walking into this restaurant's so clean amazing staff-friendly jerk rice try it amazing jerk chicken is on point. Cow foot soup yes.

Their service sucked. They tried to overcharge me for a veggie plate and 2 fish dinners i came all the way from Virginia. Just to get the food that everyone was raving about. And it sucked, too salty, and the servers have attitudes. Don't recommend.

When visiting the Bronx the Jerk House Caribbean Restaurant will be visited again . We ordered fried chicken , jerk chicken , fried fish and a cup of soup. Everything this was delicious , rate is 10/10. The waitress was very helpful.
The food was fantastic my favorite was the Rasta pasta one thing I would fix is how hot it is because I like mines piping hot otherwise really good and the people are so so lovely
Food was amazing as usual. Both ladies got to me very fast. Had the jerk bbq chicken and mac and cheese. Never lets me down.

Jerk House never disappoints. The jerk chicken was delicious as always perfectly seasoned, juicy, and full of flavor. The service was also great pleasant, welcoming, and efficient. Definitely one of my favorite spots when I‚Äôm craving something reliable and flavorful

This was my first time at Jerk House.
Oh my God, this was the best oxtails, red snapper, and jerk chicken I have ever had in my life!

People, this place is IT. Foods are seasoned and flavorful.
I will definitely come back.
Loved it here food is great and so are the ladies

Over price food.  Manu tells you a price and they charge you more. EXp. Snapper dinner say $20 on the manu and they charged me $25, Jerk fried rice they told me $3 more and they charge me $3,75.  The food was cold the shrimp was ok.   Just so over priced. I will not recommend or even ever visit again... for the price the food is nonsense

When I heard there was a place called jerk house my 1st thought was,  just another Caribbean Restaurant.  Well, was  i wrong. This place is absolutely fantastic. Very  clean, large selection of food ,  fantastic prices and the service is outstanding. I ordered the oxtails $18 , typically in a Caribbean restaurants  The oxtails get picked through and you get mostly rice , Not here they gave me plenty of Oxtails a nice portion of rice and a  Healthy amount of Steamed cabbage (cooked perfectly) and the food was delicious. My brother ordered 2 plates of Brown  Stew chicken $16 per plate,  one for him  1 for my mom , They could have shared a plate there was enough food for 4 people. The food is served hot it is fresh it is tasty it is not over spiced it is plain and simply delicious. I have traveled to Jamaica at least a dozen times , montego Bay's hipstrip would go crazy for a place like this. The tourist myself included , (although I'm not quite a tourist at this point),  would stay in a restaurant that served this Quality of food.   If you are looking for delicious  Plate of authentic tasting Caribbean Food I suggest you give this place a try.  I will certainly be returning, I intend to try  the fried shrimp, The red snapper ( in a red sauce)and I must give those spicy wings a shot.  As a person who has eaten  At  many many restaurants,  if I had to give this place a rating 1 to 5 (1 being worth 5 being best)  I would like to offer them a 6 for  Such great service with  Such a Great smile. Give them a try.
This restaurant is amazing the food is slamming and has a lot of flavor
